This game is hot garbage! You think its fun? Nah, gets old real fast. Behavior, the devs, has problems recognizing that when they introduce new killer perks to the game they don't realize how absolutely broken it is until release and the entire community complains and memes it. They let it ruin their game for months on end until they realize players really don't play much anymore then they finally rework the issue. "Forever Freddie" Forever still in the game. Pallet bugs fixed! Nope still in the game. "Machine gun Myers". Trickster. Game also seems like just a cesspool of toxicity.

刚刚有一把，三个小地球，屠夫是猪猪，队友有一个梅格，开局一台机二挂，两次我都从地图的另外一边跑过去救她，吃着做出你的选择的一刀杀。最后依靠手电筒，把屠夫的注意力吸引了过来。溜了四台机后，我还在钢铁厂工厂外面的平地和屠夫周旋，而另外两位队友直接开门往外走。场上只剩下我和梅格的时候 我吃了第二刀，就在屠夫准备死守我的时候，梅格从地图的另外一边冲过来把我从钩子上救下来，而屠夫一心杀我所以没打梅格，我第二次上钩。再次跑到门边上的梅格，指了指门的方向，又一次选择回来救我，她直接吃了两刀倒地，把我送了出去。我也不知道该怎么形容，但是觉得遇到这种队友真的好

This game is the definition of suffering from success. For every time you 4k a group of survivors, you hear the exit gates get powered when you've only gotten one hook. That contrast between the two moments are what should be pushing you to do better and better in the next game. Those survivors who t-bag you when you get stunned should be the thing to push you to improve your skill. You just have to keep going. Level up your killers/survivors, unlock their perks, master your looping, pick the killers you want to master. It's gonna take a lot of time, but the feeling of reaching rank 1 for the first time is worth it. Play both sides; killer and survivor. Learning both sides can teach you things about the other you would have never noticed, and it allows you to feel sympathy for the other side (if you care to, at least). All you got to do is contribute your monetary offering, make your choice. Serve the Entity, or fight it. The choice is yours.

Bu oyunun aptal katillerinden, aptal kurbanlarından nefret geldi artık. Hayatımda böyle salak kitleye sahip bir oyun görmedim, göremem cidden. Maç ortasında oyundan çıkanı mı dersin, kancaya asınca başında kamp yapan aptal katil mi dersin ne ararsan var. Yemin ederim nefret geldi. Allah belanızı versin ya cidden. Hiçbir oyunun kitlesi için bu kadar kötü düşünmedim. İşin en saçma yanı bu tür oyuncular ile ilgilenilmiyor, attığımız tüm reportlar tamamen boşuna bu daha sinir bozucu bir durum. Oyun zevkimin içine ettiniz gece gece, daha da bir şey demiyorum. Eğer kanser olmak istemiyorsanız ve ciddi derece sövmeden durabilecek kadar sabırlı bir insan iseniz anca öyle alın. Yoksa bu çilenin çekilir bir tarafı yok.

This games got serious issues, there's no real new content coming out besides new playable characters. Dead by Daylight is bloated with so many new characters but still only has the one game mode since release, there's zero effort to try create something new and it's disappointing. Until they add actual new content I really don't suggest purchasing this game at all.

This game is a lot of fun, just be aware of two things:

It's very buggy, almost to the point of feeling unfinished at times.

The matchmaking is so bad that public games are honestly more of an opportunity to meme than actually play the game seriously until you get decently far into it and can make a good build.  You will see players with an absurd amount of hours in the game during your first 20, and they will dunk on you and make you feel like a dumb dumb.  

If all of that sounds acceptable, play this game.  It's really fun.  Or just get your friends and do customs and meme on each other, which is better than publics by a huge margin.
